title: Allow non-admin (Teacher) users to add subjects

requirements.summary: Remove UI-level admin-only restriction from SubjectManager component so Teacher users can add subjects
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Add Subject' button is visible and enabled for Teacher-role users.
No 'only admins' warning or disabled state is shown to non-admin authenticated users.
The Add Subject dialog opens and submits successfully for Teacher users.

file_operations.description: Remove the admin-only check from the Add Subject dialog. Currently, the component displays 'Unauthorized: Only admins can add subjects' for non-admin users. Remove the `useGetCallerUserRole` hook call and the conditional rendering that shows the unauthorized message. Ensure the Add Subject dialog is accessible to all authenticated users (including Teacher role). Keep the dialog structure, form validation, and `useAddSubject` mutation intact. Do not modify the Subject data model (name and code fields only).
